title: Anna Heinrich and Tim Robards enjoy a romantic river cruise in Paris for his birthday
text:
They've been globetrotting around the world in recent weeks on an idyllic holiday.

And on Thursday, Anna Heinrich surprised husband Tim Robards with a romantic river cruise in Paris to celebrate his 37th birthday.

Anna took to Instagram to share a series of loved-up snaps of herself with her man enjoying a boat trip along the picturesque Seine River.

Well it is the city of love! Anna Heinrich stunned in a pink dress as she and husband Tim Robards enjoyed a romantic river cruise in Paris for his 37th birthday

Anna opted for a chic pink Rebecca Vallance dress with long flared sleeves.

She completed her look with a bold black belt, and oversized gold hoop earrings.

Meanwhile, Tim looked suave in a striped shirt.

Anna stunned with minimum makeup, wearing a light shade of foundation and pink shade of lipstick.

In one snap, the couple looked cosy as Tim put his arm around her waist and gave her a kiss on her cheek.

Loved-up! Anna took to Instagram to share a series of loved-up snaps of the pair enjoying a boat trip along the picturesque Seine River

The former Bachelor star took to own Instagram to document the couple's travels - sharing a video of their romantic trip on the river.

'I've got totally spoiled, this is my birthday present from Anna,' he said in the video.

Anna meanwhile appeared thrilled and joked: 'I've outdid myself'.

Tim then said: 'Basically the wife best ever!.. Why?'

He then pointed the camera towards the Eiffel Tower, and said 'that's why.'

How romantic! 'I've got totally spoiled, this is my birthday present from Anna,' Tim revealed in a clip shared to his Instagram

It comes after Tim and Anna enjoyed time at a winery outside of Paris.

The pair also spent time in Marrakesh in Morocco, staying at a luxury resort in the desert.

The pair - who married in Italy in June last year - are spending quality time together, being in a long-distance marriage thanks to their respective work commitments.

Tim is down in Melbourne for Neighbours, while Anna lives at their home in Sydney. The pair said they reunite on weekends.

Anna told Stellar magazine recently: 'I think people almost want us to find [living separately] difficult, but I really don't.'
description: They've been globetrotting around the world in recent weeks on an idyllic holiday.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
